definition: to switch from one major or faculty to another (at a university)

sentences.english: She used to study Russian, but lately she changed to biology.
sentences.chinese: 她原來是學俄語的，但最近改學了生物。

sentences.english: He switched to medicine and graduated in 1980.
She abandoned law for the fine arts.
sentences.chinese: 她放棄法律而改學美術。

sentences.english: The girl has given up the piano and gone over to the violin.
sentences.chinese: 那個小女孩已經學鋼琴改學小提琴了。

sentences.english: We learn German instead of French.
sentences.chinese: 我們不學法語，改學德語。

sentences.english: You no in sports. Why learn music .
sentences.chinese: 你對體育不感興趣。爲何不改學音樂？
